values:
As you may have noticed, I'm not posting much here anymore.  I'm still around, just not as visible.  

Will still use this to check my friends page, communities, etc.  

Things have changed and I just can't be honest here anymore.  

To new beginnings and such.

You know what?  

I'm fucking done with this.  

You know where to find me.

Because everyone seems to have misunderstood my previous public post, I'll explain so I can stop getting not-so-nice emails. 1. I only meant that Sara can now join Lesa's club of disliking me because of LJ drama. 2. I never drew similarities between the two of them in any other way. It was everyone else who jumped to that conclusion. 3. Jenny, Joanne, you both know that I haven't even mentioned Lesa in a year. Why would I purposefully insult her in a public post? Thanks for thinking that I'd suddenly feel the need to badmouth her in public after never saying a word about her to two people I know are her friends. It's her life. She can do whatever the hell she chooses. I took myself out of the situation because I couldn't watch it happen anymore but I wish her no ill-will. That is all. We now return you to your usually scheduled friends-only journal.

If you are going to knowingly lie your ass off to someone you supposedly love, don't cry about them leaving you afterwards. And definitely don't expect his friends to forgive you for fucking him over, even if he does. (Because he's blinded by you, for some reason.) This is especially true if you lied to those friends, too. So you've thrown away a great boyfriend and some great friends just because you were too much of a coward to tell the truth. How does it feel? PS-I was honest about the K/T thing. I came forward about it as soon as I knew what was going on. T knew about everything from the beginning, and K, well, he knew. I am a lot of things, but a hypocrite is not one of them. Sara, meet Lesa. Lesa, meet Sara. Add one more to the club. I don't care. This is not a cowardly post, I just don't care what you have to say.

1. If you reach an answering machine, speak clearly. Leave your name and phone number, even if you think I know who it is or already have your number. Sometimes I forget my phone and check my messages from elsewhere, where your number is not programmed in. 2. If you are giving directions, be specific. If you don't drive, give the damn phone to someone who does. Landmarks are good things to include. 3. Don't back out of things at the last minute. It's frustrating and fucks up everyone's plans. Try to give at least 24 hours notice. 4. Don't come to my house, eat my food, and use my stuff only to later say that I'm selfish. 5. Get a room. I don't care how cute you think it is, nobody wants to see that shit. 6. Do what you say you're going to do. If you say you'll call, call. If you say you'll be somewhere, be there. 7. Don't forget about your friends the minute you get a significant other. It makes us feel like we were only filling in until you found him/her. 8. Pay attention. 9. If you don't have a car, don't complain about my driving or the mess in mine. And pitch in for gas if I'm picking you up, it's just polite. 10. Soap. Toothpaste. Deodorant. Know them. Love them. Use them. 11. If you are a guest somewhere, clean up after yourself. If you are at a restaurant, use your damn silverware (unless you ordered a burger or something like that). I have an etiquette book I'll be happy to lend you if you are confused about any of this. Thank you for joining us on this educational post.

Thanks for nothing? OK. How about this: Every day I face euthanasia. Every day I face a room full of cats and kittens, dog and puppies just waiting for homes. It never ends. Sure, you may have homes for the 6 kittens your cat has..but what if she has 12? And the 6 homes you find for them will mean 6 less homes for the already homeless cats in the shelter. And when your friends use the same excuses you are and don't get their kittens spayed or neutered, we'll end up with 6 more, 16 more, 26 more, and it just keeps going. Fact: A female cat and her offspring can produce up to a startling 420,000 kittens in just seven years. Can you find homes for all of them, too? And when Loki isn't a good mom (as happens with many first cat moms), are you prepared to be up every 2 hours to bottle feed the kittens? Are you prepared for the vet costs that may come up when she's stuck in labor for 26 hours? What about when a kitten gets stuck halfway out and dies, keeping Loki in pain until you can find the time and the money to get her to a vet? It is less cruel to spay her 2 weeks before she's due than to expose her to the possibility of a painful death because of complications. Also, she's never been vaccinated. The chances of her having Feline Leukemia or Feline Immunodeficiency Virus are very high. These are diseases with no cure. They will make her sick. She will die if she has them. Testing is an additional 20 dollars through the humane society. So don't give me that "thanks for nothing" crap. Do my job for 1 week and you will understand. Hell, volunteer at an animal shelter for 1 day and you will understand. Every day I face this. More info Bowling Green-Warren County Humane Society 1925 Old Louisville Rd, Bowling Green, KY 42101 (270) 842-8572 They offer spaying for cats for only 29 dollars. So don't say you don't have the money...you just haven't looked for somewhere that will do it for the money you do have.

Know a collector?  Are you a museum curator?  Know musicians?  This is a rare opportunity!  

If you know of anyone who may be interested in purchasing a limited edition, life-sized bronze John Lennon statue by a Cuban sculptor, please get in touch via comment or email.  Only 10 statues will ever be cast.  I have photos available for interested parties.  

These are expensive statues-upwards of 30,000 dollars.  Serious inquiries only, please.

It's not as if you could pretend that none of it ever happened.  We had great times.  I fucked that all up and I've admitted it countless times.  I understand that I can't be in your life anymore...

But it hurts when you act like I'm invisible.  I don't exist to you anymore.  I smiled at you.  Trying to be polite and adult, you know?  And you looked past me, through me, anywhere but at me.  

Truth?  I deserve it.  I still kick myself about it.  It's the one thing in my life that I regret.  So I take every ounce of negativity that you can throw at me and I dissolve it in my beer and drink it down.  I meant everything I said to you when I called from Australia.  I was too much of a coward to follow through.  

But I can still smile and say that it was <strike>good</strike> great while it lasted.  Thank you for the amazing memories.

Someone once told me the story of how he got his car...

The original car broke down in a dinky little town, there were no parts to fix it, so he was left with the option of buying this one car he didn't want or this other car that didn't work.  So he bought the car that he didn't want.  

Yeah, it's an anticlimactic story when I tell it.  Surprised?  

Point is, history repeats itself.  (to a point)

You can get from Louisville, KY to Denver, CO for only $180 (round trip).  (Leaving Oct 9 and returning Oct 13.)  

And for those of you considering a permanent relocation....Jet Blue has $127 one way ticket from JFK to Denver.  (Leaving Weds, Sept 18th..you could be here for my birthday)   


Just thought some of you might be interested.  

<small>comevisitme</small>

You can get from Nashville to Denver (with only 1 stop, on only 1 airline) round trip for 182 dollars.  

That's right kids, thanks to www.orbitz.com, the low low price of 182 dollars gets you from hot, sticky Nashville, Tennessee to beautiful, dry as a virgin on a pity date, Denver, Colorado.  (And home again, if you'd actually want to go back.)

Of course, if you live a bit more East (like, say, New York), it'll cost you more, but it's a direct flight.  316 dollars gets you here and back in a flash.  

Come visit me!  

(And now I've wasted most of my day.)

So much changes in a year. Last year at this time I was... -Still hanging out with Kyro. He had a kick ass 4th o' July party. I had the best time, even though I was a bit sick. Damn. Thinking about it makes me almost wanna cry. -Still in school, but almost finished. -Had not yet gone to Australia, didn't even know I was going to stay for a month. -Hadn't yet met Damien. -Hadn't yet met Lesa. -Hadn't yet med Adam (aka Atom). See? Lots has changed/evolved/ended. Some of it makes me happy, other parts of it make me all nostalgic and .....other things.... Sometimes I wonder if he remembers the good times....like the rainbow in front of us after a huge rainstorm at the RenFest.
Pretty much everything here is friends only now.  Sorry to disappoint, but I've been discovered by a few who were not welcome.

I've been informed that I need to dismantle the computer so the boys can take the desk down to the truck.  

I will not cry.  

Goodbye internet access.  I'm reachable by phone.

Good morning. 

I'm moving now.  

And still packing.

I talked with the landlady today.  Told her about the kitty.  No problems.  

I did not get any packing done today due to ear problems.  But I've been thinking about it a lot.  And staring at stuff that still needs to be packed.  Does that count?

I hate love moving. Been packing like a madwoman. 9 boxes down and still tons of stuff left. Nutty. There's nothing on my walls now. The apartment looks very plain. Doesn't quite feel like home anymore. There's still an open invitation to anyone who wants free pizza and beer (or any other type of liquor/drinks) and is willing to help me move Saturday afternoon. Yeaaaaaah. S'anyway... We missed and on Saturday due to phone difficulties. Suck. I really wanted to meet/hang with them. (ohhhhh the cool LJ crowd...I feel so accepted) *guffaw* We'll have to try it again soon. Oh, and I also need to hang out with again. OK. I need to get my happy butt to bed. I can NOT be late for work in the morning.

I just realized that I only told the landlord about my dog.  How do I break the news about the cat?  

Normally I'd just not tell, but she lives downstairs and I think she might find out.

Wow...

Yesterday I called Dad and talked with him about my apartment hunt.  Told him how much I loved the one place that Kyle and I looked at.  Also told him that now Kyle's not moving out here so I won't be able to move into it.  No big deal, right?  I'll find another place that I can afford on my own.  

And this is why my dad rocks the universe:  
He said:  "You should be able to live in a place that you love.  I'll cover the other half of the rent until you find another roommate.  Go ahead and get the apartment."  

Amazing.  I'm going to put down the deposit today.  Anyone need a roomie?  (The apartment is completely beyond cool, if you're really interested, drop me a line and I'll send you pics and give you details.)

On a totally unrelated note:  

I changed the belt in my vacuum cleaner tonight.  All by myself.  I feel so handy.  

Alright, I'm really going to bed now.

I can't decide if I like my lack of insomnia or hate it.  

Either way, I need to sleep now.  These working-at-7am-mornings kill me.

It's way bloody cold. And snowing. Go ahead, ask me if I remembered to buy firewood. And, by the way, overtime is such my bitch this week. This paycheck better rock my socks, yo. And now...off to feed other addictions....

Work was good.  Really busy.  

I'm watching this pet psychic thing on Animal Planet.  It's making me cry.  I'm such a sap for stuff like this.

By the way...
I stabbed myself in the hand at work today.  
No, silly, it was an accident.  Ms. Kitty wasn't cooperating.  
Needles are sharp.  Luckily, they're also sterile.  

And also...
I really want to take a bath by candlelight, but I've waited too long and now all I have time for is a short shower.  Frumpf.  

One other thing...
It's bloody cold and I'm once again out of firewood.  Thursday is supposed to be like -3.  *shiver*  Must buy firewood by then.  Damn, I'm going to miss the fireplace here.  

OK, just one more, really...
I've decided to go clubbing as much as possible.  This means once a week I will be shakin' my groove thang at one place or another.  I realized on Saturday that I really missed dancing, and I need that in my life.  I'm open to bringing along new people.  Apply by Saturday afternoon.

Last night rocked. I actually went dancing! I'd forgotten how much I missed it. And now I have a cool girl to go with! Here's the story: At around 11pm I decided I wanted to go out, so I left a comment. She agreed to come out with me. I went to pick her up over in Lakewood, then drove down to Vinyl (it was their 18+ night and Jenny's only 20). I'd never been to Vinyl before, but it was ok. Enough space and a pretty eclectic crowd of people. I didn't go upstairs because Jenny couldn't go and it's not cool to leave your friends alone. The dj was ok. Not great, just ok. I think her name was SpaceGirl. She spun mostly house, but threw in some trance, too. Here's the kicker of the situation: Apparently I'm a good dancer. I had a few guys come up to me and tell me they liked my dancing and Jenny thought I was good too. I dunno, I always thought I was ok, but not like great or anything. Not someone that would get watched just for their dancing. *shrug* Whatever, I just like to dance, and I couldn't give a shit if I'm any good or not. Anyhooooo, Jenny danced with some guy who was kinda cute and seems alright. (Despite my attempt to rescue her when I misread her signal. Oops! Sorry about that!) Jenny had to go to work, so we jetted at last call (like 1:30). It was a great night. I had an awesome time. And now, I'm going to look at more apartments.
Think you know a little about me? Give it a whirl: Go here to take it.

Hate me.  I dare you.  Because honestly, I don't give a rat's ass what you think.  

<small>i told him that if the situation were reversed, i'd go to him.  and all he could do was get a slightly panicked look on his face and say in that accent that melted me into a puddle of american lusting goo "you better not be showin' up on me doorstep."  and i laughed to make him think i wasn't so serious</small>

Shut up.  I know I need to get over it.  I need a new object of obsession.  Anyone volunteering?

AAAAAAAAAAAA!

This day is crazy.  

More to come later.

I want cookies.  

That is all.

I'm getting very frustrated with this apartment hunting thing. -Do you allow dogs? Ok. Thanks. *click* -What's the square footage on that? Ok. Thanks. *click* (um, maybe if I turn my couch on its end, sell my bed and sleep in the bathtub..oh, there is no bathtub? ) -What's the rent on that one? *stifles laughter* Ok. Thanks. *click* AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRGGGGGGGGG. Help. Does anyone know a good place to live in Lakewood/West Denver that allows a 20 lb, well behaved dog? It has to be under 650 a month.

I hope this is not an indicator of how this job is going to be.  
Things that have me just a bit worried:  
1.  My interview started late (not that big a deal, since they were busy)
2.  The lady who interviewed me seemed a bit flakey 
3.  They originally said they'd email me info on salary/benefits, but I ended up calling them to get the information
4.  She said she'd call me back last night or today and let me know about a schedule.  I haven't heard from her yet.  I'm calling.  

I guess this is just the sort of place where I'm going to have to  be pushy.  I can do that.  

PS-Valerian root rocks.  I slept last night.  At a decent hour.  And I was up at 10am.  Amazing.

I am officially employed.  They are calling me back later/tomorrow with a semi-schedule.  I start on Wednesday.  

Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeek.  I'm joining the real world!

Just in case you were wondering...

I had a great time in Greeley (surprising as that is).  
I made it home ok, despite the wind trying to push my car off the road.  
I am way foonkin' tired.  
Tomorrow (er..today, later), I will have a job.  

Goodnight kids.  Someone call me at like 2 to wake me up please.  I promise to try to be as ungrumpy as possible.

I'm about to head up to Greeley because there's nothing interesting happening here.  

Wait...what did I just say?  *shudder*

Anyhoo, I'm going to party with some theatre kids.  Should be fun.  If I remember correctly from my stint with that crowd back in Kentucky, they throw a good party.  

My computer needs to see a psychiatrist.  It keeps opening windows I asked for 5 minutes ago.  I think it might be schitzophrenic.

Stolen without permission from 60 Things Not to Say to a Naked Guy 1. I've smoked fatter joints than that. 2. Ahh, it's cute. 3. Who circumcised you? 4. Why don't we just cuddle? 5. You know they have surgery to fix that. 6. It's more fun to look at. 7. Make it dance. 8. You know, there's a tower in Italy like that. 9. Can I paint a smiley face on that? 10. It looks like a night crawler. 11. Wow, and your feet are so big. 12. My last boyfriend was 4'' bigger. 13. It's ok, we'll work around it. 14. Is this a mild or a spicy Slim Jim? 15. Eww, there's an inch worm on your thigh. 16. Will it squeak if I squeeze it? 17. Oh no, a flash headache. 18. (giggle and point) 19. Can I be honest with you? 20. My 8-year-old brother has one like that. 21. Let me go get my tweezers. 22. How sweet, you brought incense. 23. This explains your car. 24. You must be a growing boy. 25. Maybe if we water it, it'll grow. 26. Thanks, I needed a toothpick. 27. Are you one of those pygmies? 28. Have you ever thought of working in a sideshow? 29. Every heard of clearasil? 30. All right, a treasure hunt! 31. I didn't know they came that small. 32. Why is God punishing you? 33. At least this won't take long. 34. I never saw one like that before. 35. What do you call this? 36. But it still works, right? 37. Damn, I hate baby-sitting. 38. It looks so unused. 39. Do you take steroids? 40. I hear excessive masturbation shrinks it. 41. Maybe it looks better in natural light. 42. Why don't we skip right to the cigarettes? 43. Oh, I didn't know you were in an accident. 44. Did you date Lorena Bobbitt? 45. Aww, it's hiding. 46. Are you cold? 47. If you get me real drunk first. 48. Is that an optical illusion? 49. What is that? 50. I'll go get the ketchup for your french fry. 51. Were you neutered? 52. It's a good thing you have so many other talents. 53. Does it come with an air pump? 54. So this is why you're supposed to judge people on personality. 55. Where are the puppet strings? 56. Your big gun is more like a BB gun. 57. Look, it fits my Barbie clothes. 58. Never mind, why bother. 59. Is that a second belly button? 60. Where's the rest of it?

Went to see Mullholland Drive tonight. 1. David Lynch is a crack smoking freak. 2. What the fuck was going on in that movie? Seriously, even after I came home and read the salon.com synopsis/explaination thing, I'm still all weirded out by the movie. Pieces of it just don't fit, don't make sense. And, while it was a well made film, I really want to kick David Lynch in the junk and tell him to stop being so damn cryptic. 3. Cinema Grill is a cool place. More comfortable than a typical movie theatre, decent food and you can order alcohol. Only down side is that you can't smoke in there. That is all.

I'm having a lazy day. Lit a fire, watching some MTV special on rock stars. What I wouldn't give to be involved in that life. I'm such a good background girlfriend. I don't want to be the person that's famous, I want to be famous by association. I got flowers from my father. "Congratulations on your new job!" Yeah. Sometimes I feel like Corey (Liv Tyler) from Empire Records.

About to go to bed, finally.  Don't even know why I'm writing since I didn't really feel the need to get anything off of my chest.  

I had a good night. Very relaxing, laid back.  Went to shoot pool with a great friend.  Had amazing conversations over Killians and my horrid attempts at sinking the 8 ball.  I swear, I used to be decent at pool.  I have no idea what happened.  Reverse gravitational pull of the Earth...or something.  

So.  I'm taking the job in Lakewood.  I've made my final decision.  Need to call them tomorrow, I guess.  I just hope they don't want me to start on Monday.  Er...Maybe I'll just call on Monday.  That'd ensure my not having to start then.  
/ramble
off to try that sleep thing.

Exam over. I would yeehaw with more excitement, but I'm too tired. Not going to comment on ease of exam right now, due to my superstious side. All I'll say is that I think I have a good chance of having passed. Yah. Now I have nothing to be stressed about. Exam's over, I have good job offers, Chazzbear might be here soon. All good things. Methinks I will have a hot pocket. And then a nap. I have an utter lack of responsibility until at least Monday. This makes me quite happy. And somebody has some explaining to do. Get in touch kiddo. Who wants to come out with me tonight? Anyone feel like meeting me for a drink later?

Exam is tooooo close now. Studied for 4 hours today. Mildly freaking out. Need sleep. Can't wait for this all to be over. I bought a thing of mixed fruit mentos for the exam tomorrow. I guess I need to stop eating them now. And I bought new pencils. Bic mechanical pencils with #2 led and brand new white erasers. It's kind of a tradition for me. I always buy new pencils before big exams. Does it help? It helps my psychosis, and that's all that matters. I'm going to go smoke a few cigarettes and then force myself to bed. Wish me luck.

AND WHO IS TAKING ME OUT FOR DRINKS TOMORROW?

I'll need them....and I wanna celebrate.

I just finished the white fudge covered oreos (there were only 2 left).  This greatly saddens me.  I won't be able to get them again until next year.  

*licks fingers*

They should make them year-round.  Er...no they shouldn't, it would only feed my addiction.  
Off to do some last minute studying for tomorrow's exam.

I got offered the job in Lakewood!  
-Paid CE 
-Discounted pet health care
-Flexible hours
-1 Week vacation after 1 year, 2 weeks after 2 years, 3 weeks after 5 years
-Health insurance (but it doesn't include vision or dental)  
-Starting salary of 10/hr for training, 12-14/hr after training.

Do I take it?  It's a clinic that is a little behind the times currently, but they are working with a top notch consultant and expanding and restructuring the whole place to make it cutting edge.  There is lots of opportunity for growth in this practice.  All that and it's only about 25 minutes from my current apartment.  
Need to think about this.

I've just had an epiphany.  

My wings have been disabled.  

And I've gone completely insane.  

A pegasus with broken wings amounts to little more than a lawnmower.

*sigh*

Napped for too long.  Have that groggy feeling.  I need company.  

Why aren't you here?  

<lj-cut text="In other news">
In other news:  
Talked to Chazzbear for a while.  Almost have him convinced to drop everything and come out here quick-like.  So we'll both be broke for a while.  So we'll hate living in this little one bedroom apartment for a while.  But it won't be for long.  No bringing dates home for either of us whilst doing this, if it really happens.  I'm trying not to get my hopes up.  Also talked to Kyle for a bit.  Something about Vegas for a few months, then here.  I don't understand him.  I think it has something to do with the fact that Kyle's logic is just a little skewed.  If there is any logic in his actions at all.  I'm hoping that if Chazz comes out here soon it'll speed Kyle up.  I miss those guys.  

Yeeeeeeeah.  National exam on Friday.   I've studied a bit.  It's amazing how a 200 question multiple choice exam can dictate the rest of my life.  Breathe. Just Breathe.  I need a hug.  And someone to kiss my forehead and tell me that everything's ok.  

Blah blah blah.  I plan on being plastered somewhere on Friday night.  I just need to find someone to drive.  I need friends who like to club.  

I guess that's all.

I don't know what was with me last night, but the mood has carried over a bit.  I still want adventure and excitement...but I need a nap first.  

I surprised myself today by having a kick ass interview after only getting 3 hours of sleep.  They want me, but I'm not sure if I want them.  

Story of my life, bane of my existence.

I want to do something crazy.  Somebody offer me something insane.  Offer to move to London with me.  Offer to sell all your stuff and roadtrip around the country with me.  Offer me adventure.  

When I wake up, I want to know what this is all about.

It's 23 degrees outside
but my heart feels much colder
and only this cigarette to warm me
when it should be your hands
covering mine
forcing out the cold
with your words

I want you to find me.  
I want to get lost in you.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Job interview in 8.5 hours.  Rescue me.  
I'm not sure this life is mine.

Worked at kennel for 4 hours.  I'm way too tired for only having done 4 hours of work.  

Must go acquire nourishment now.
